notes.text: sap.m.Button: Add Ghost Button type
sap.m.FacetFilter: Update button text properly when SingleSelectMaster mode is used
sap.m.IconTabBar sap.m.QuickView sap.m.Text: Visual Tests for Android test are now fixed
sap.m.Link: removed href attribute if property href is not set
sap.m.MessageView: Header's visibility adjusted
sap.m.MultiInput: Unneeded visual test removed
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Add possibility to set zero as a title
sap.m.Popover: Show scrollbar when overflowing and out of visible area.
sap.m.Select: TAB handling added
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Cloned item now works with binding
Opa: throw error when iFrame is launched but one already exists
sap.m.DatePicker: set max possible hour to the default maxDate
sap.m.FacetFilter: Correct selection when growing is used.
sap.m.MessagePopover: The headerButton is now being bound correctly
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Search is now working correctly
sap.m.Text: Ellipsis is now shown when the label is required
sap.m.Timepicker: position selection frame properly in DateTimepicker on small screens
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: Fixed overflow calculations
sap.m.DatePicker: Precision of milliseconds set to the third digit
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Appointment deselection is now possible
sap.m.StepInput: Added description text after the input field.
TimePicker-closing before slider scrolling is complete works.
sap.m.Dialog: Error state icon now has correct color
sap.m.Dialog: Typo in documantation is now fixed
sap.m.FacetFilter: Reset search value when FacetFilterList is closed
sap.m.Label: Required asterix is now positioned correctly
sap.m.ListBase: Hide busy indicator on updateFinished.
sap.m.Menu: after removal from items aggregation item is still usable.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Long title wraps on Firefox and IE
sap.m.Page: Nested pages scrolling fixed.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: does not throw exception when sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend is used
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Fixed handling of values greater than 100
sap.m.QuickView sap.m.NotificationListItem sap.m.Text sap.m.SplitApp: Visual tests fro Android are now fixed
sap.m.TextArea: Growing property now has a proper behavior.
sap.m.Timepicker: add validation for minutesStep and secondsStep
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: when model is changed, filter counter is updated.
sap.ui.dt:added isVisible function to designtime and visible check
